attributes.action: Have a petition to hold another referendum into our membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details: None of the promised advantages have happened we were lied to.We want a chance to right the obvious wrong.
attributes.background: The people were obviously lied to at the time of the EU referendum.We were promised cheaper food . No downsides only sunlit uplands and taking back control.Alongside oven ready deals.A good period of time has lapsed since.The vote leave lobby obviously misled the electorate.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on re-joining the European Union
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700041
